rack.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a frame or shelf that has bars or hooks on which you can put things
rack.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a three-sided frame used for arranging the balls at the start of a game of snooker or pool
rack.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to make someone suffer great mental or physical pain
rack.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Her face was racked with pain.
rack.translation[1].definitions[0].note_: Rack is often passive in this meaning
